_source.short_desc: Logi Analytics is the only vendor exclusively focused on application teams and embedded analytics.
_source.long_desc: The best way to deliver information to people is in the applications they use every day. That's why Logi built the #1 development platform for embedded analytics. For over 17 years, Logi has helped application teams embed sophisticated analytics in their applications. In a noisy market, Logi is the only analytics provider exclusively focused on embedding analytics in commercial and enterprise applications. And were the long-standing market leader in embedded analytics, recognized by Gartner.

related_products.short_desc: Tableau helps people and organizations become more data-driven as the trusted leader in analytics. Learn More!
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Sisense is a full-scale reporting & analytics solution that lets business users visualize, explore & drive insights from complex data
related_products.features: Sisense goes beyond traditional business intelligence by providing organizations with the ability to infuse analytics everywhere, embedded in both customer and employee applications and workflows. Sisense customers are breaking through the barriers of analytics adoption by going beyond the dashboard with Sisense Fusion - the highly customizable, AI-driven analytics cloud platform, that infuses intelligence at the right place and the right time, every time.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your business data.
related_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

related_products.short_desc: Bring all of your data sources together, ensure the data is clean and accurate, and manage security and access to your data.
related_products.features: With Domo's embedded analytics solution, you can distribute personalized dashboards to your clients and partners whether embedded in the portals you build, integrated with the software you sell, or connected across the instances Domo hosts. Scalable data distribution from start to finish.

related_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is the most customizable BI and data analytics platform that was built to be embedded seamlessly into your existing apps.
related_products.features: Dundas BI was designed to be embedded and seamlessly integrates into your existing systems and applications for a great user experience. Whether you need to enhance your clients? web portal with better reporting, embed dashboards into your on-premises and SaaS offerings, or build an entirely new data application from scratch, we?ve got you covered. Free trial, full download or live demo available.

related_products.short_desc: Try for free! Embedding analytics in your business applications empowers users with Notebooks, visualizations, reports & dashboards.
related_products.features: Try for free! Embedded analytics and reporting in your business applications. Mode lets you embed a flexible cloud-based SQL editor, integrated Python & R notebooks, interactive visualizations, and shareable live reports and dashboards directly into your product or application. Empower your users to start their analytics quickly and go from question to insight in under an hour.

related_products.short_desc: SAP Analytics Cloud is the all-in-one cloud platform for business intelligence, planning and predictive analytics.
related_products.features: SAP Analytics Cloud is a powerful data visualization tool that helps businesses of all sizes do more with data. By transforming static spreadsheets into actionable insights, you can make better fact-based decisions, uncover hidden trends and improve your business performance quickly. SAP Analytics Cloud combines all analytics capabilities - including business intelligence, planning and predictive analytics - in a single cloud-based solution.

related_products.short_desc: Cluvio is a modern SQL and R-based cloud analytics platform to create and embed beautiful, interactive dashboards for your product.
related_products.features: Cluvio is a modern data analytics platform that lets you run SQL queries against your database, process data in R, visualize the results and create beautiful, interactive dashboards in minutes that can be embedded in you product easily. With pricing optimized for startups and small companies, it is easy and cost effective to add powerful analytics capabilities to your product.

related_products.short_desc: Exago BI is 100% web-based, seamlessly EMBEDDED, no plugins required, solution for application software providers
related_products.features: Exago BI is an EMBEDDED Business Intelligence solution for Software Providers. We are 100% web-based, no plugins required, solution for software companies looking to provide ad hoc reporting, dashboards and business analysis to their clients. Our full-featured BI solution tightly integrates with your web-based SaaS and or on-premise application and allows non-technical users to create reports and dashboards without help from IT.

related_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
related_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

related_products.short_desc: Infor OS is a leader in next-generation BI and analytics, offering agility, automation, and optimization for the entire BI process.
related_products.features: Infor OS is a leader in next-generation BI and analytics, offering automation and optimization for the entire BI process - ETL/data preparation, operational reporting, visual data discovery, interactive dashboards, and advanced analytics. Infor OS's unique networked BI approach connects every user to a shared analytical fabric that can easily be accessed and extended. This shared network of analytics delivers agility for business users while maintaining IT-governed oversight.

similar_products.short_desc: Bold BI makes it easy to embed dashboards anywhere you choose. Host on AWS/Azure etc. Single sign-on security. Simple licensing.
similar_products.features: Bold BI by Syncfusion makes it simple to see analytics where ever you choose. You have total control over the integration using JS, Angular, React, Docker, Kubernetes, the list goes on. Bold BI was built from the ground up to used inside other applications, with all the modern features. Bold BI can be hosted anywhere including on AWS and Azure. Embedded BI is the future. Get a free demo today. Visit our website to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: Choose a business intelligence solution that is purpose-built for the embedded analytics market.
similar_products.features:
Empower everyone in your organization to make smarter business decisions. Embedded analytics software like Reveal brings real-time, interactive data visualizations and business intelligence capabilities directly into enterprise applications - creating in-context analytics that improve the usability of data for business users.
When data is easy to see, it's easy to take action.

similar_products.short_desc: Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform built to reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users.
similar_products.features:
Toucan is a cloud-based, guided analytics platform with one goal in mind: reduce the complexity of bringing insights from data to business users. 

The Toucan team has worked from day one to make every experience on the platform simple, fast, and understandable even for complex tasks. 

The allows easy embedding into SaaS products using either web components or iFrames and can be performed by even non-expert users. Includes extensive customization, and adoption and management tools.

similar_products.short_desc: Informer 5 is a robust, extensible, end-to-end data discovery and analytics platform connecting all your on-prem and cloud data.
similar_products.features: Informer 5 is a robust, embeddable data discovery and analytics platform that simplifies the process of accessing, cleansing, blending, and analyzing data. Explore, visualize and analyze relevant data on the fly. Securely publish Reports and collaborate with colleagues. Generate Dashboards that consolidate critical performance metrics.

similar_products.short_desc: Dundas BI is the most customizable BI and data analytics platform that was built to be embedded seamlessly into your existing apps.
similar_products.features: Dundas BI was designed to be embedded and seamlessly integrates into your existing systems and applications for a great user experience. Whether you need to enhance your clients? web portal with better reporting, embed dashboards into your on-premises and SaaS offerings, or build an entirely new data application from scratch, we?ve got you covered. Free trial, full download or live demo available.

similar_products.short_desc: Qrvey is an all-in-one business analytics platform for embedded and distributed use cases that moves beyond visualizations using AWS.
similar_products.features: Qrvey simplifies analytics on AWS with an all-in-one platform that lets companies move beyond just visualizations and include your entire data pipeline. It integrates data collection, transformation, analysis, automation and machine learning using a serverless, microservices-based architecture that's highly flexible, scalable and cost-efficient. Qrvey was built for modern data needs and accepts semi- and unstructured dark data sources. It's perfect for embedded and distributed use cases.

similar_products.short_desc: Bring all of your data sources together, ensure the data is clean and accurate, and manage security and access to your data.
similar_products.features: With Domo's embedded analytics solution, you can distribute personalized dashboards to your clients and partners whether embedded in the portals you build, integrated with the software you sell, or connected across the instances Domo hosts. Scalable data distribution from start to finish.

similar_products.features: A self-service business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights on your business information. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports in minutes with no IT help. Data can be imported from applications and databases, even behind firewalls. Zoho Analytics also includes Zoho DataPrep which connect, model, cleanse, transform, and enrich data for analytics.

similar_products.short_desc: Embed Quaeris uses AI to help businesses get insights from their data, without the need of expensive developers or analysts.
similar_products.features:
For a B2B software provider, Quaeris is the only way to embed dashboards. With its natural language interface, your users will love using Quaeris every day to ask  questions of their data and build their own insights. 

Guaranteed 10x increase in adoption and stickiness of your product!

Quaeris is 'micro-front end' enabled for quick embedding of components (Search, Collaboration, Pinboard, Storyboard etc.) into your existing products.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.
similar_products.features: Embed reports, dashboards, and AI-driven automated insights into your application with Yellowfin, a powerful suit of analytics products. Ranked #1 for embedded BI by many industry analysts, Yellowfin allows you to completely white label for a seamless UI. Deliver automated insights in a feed, provide powerful dashboards that can be custom coded to call on APIs to let users take action, and empower your customers to collaborate and tell data stories - all with Yellowfin.

similar_products.short_desc: Cluvio is a modern SQL and R-based cloud analytics platform to create and embed beautiful, interactive dashboards for your product.
similar_products.features: Cluvio is a modern data analytics platform that lets you run SQL queries against your database, process data in R, visualize the results and create beautiful, interactive dashboards in minutes that can be embedded in you product easily. With pricing optimized for startups and small companies, it is easy and cost effective to add powerful analytics capabilities to your product.

similar_products.short_desc: Power BI Connector for Jira allows you to export your Jira data to Power BI and build necessary dashboards with Jira data.
similar_products.features: Power BI Connector for Jira allows you to import easily and quickly any Jira data into Microsoft Power BI, including default fields and custom fields, History, Worklogs, Sprints, 3rd-party apps data, and others.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Visualization software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Visualization tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Visualization software helps companies present information in an organized, graphical and easily searchable manner. This type of software is designed to integrate with existing applications and use data to build visual presentations. For related software solutions see Business Intelligence software, Knowledge Management software and Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Integration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Integration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Integration software allows separate applications to communicate and share data. Organizations use these applications to facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date company data. Integration solutions allow for the sharing of information and business functions across multiple applications and provide the user with a single point of access. Typically these applications also provide integrated reporting tools, allowing the synthesis of data from multiple applications and repositories. Integration software is related to Business Process Management software and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Reporting software applications allow real-time access to essential data as well as the rapid generation of multidimensional reports from diverse data sources. Among many other uses, Reporting software can generate financial statements, track the success of sales strategies, monitor responsiveness to regulatory compliance concerns and manage internal controls or security audits. Reporting software is related to Business Intelligence software and Survey software.

related_products.short_desc: With 15+ years in the agile space, Jira offers teams the top tools and best practices to provide the right foundation for growth.
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why Asana is a top performer on Capterra.
related_products.features: Asana helps teams orchestrate their work-from daily tasks to strategic cross-functional initiatives. With Asana, teams are more confident, move faster, and accomplish more with less-no matter where they are located. More than 119,000 paying customers and millions of free organizations across 190 countries rely on Asana to manage everything from company objectives to digital transformation to product launches and marketing campaigns.

related_products.short_desc: Create your own custom dashboard with drag-and-drop building blocks that let you see all of your team's work at a glance.
related_products.features: On monday.com's open platform, you can create dashboards within minutes on pre-made templates. Or, add columns, widgets, and apps to fully customize your dashboard for your workflows, no matter how unique they may be. With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Tableau Software helps people see and understand data. Tableau delivers fast analytics, visualization and business intelligence.
related_products.features: Tableau helps people transform data into actionable insights that make an impact. Easily connect to data stored anywhere, in any format. Quickly perform ad hoc analyses that reveal hidden opportunities. Drag and drop to create interactive dashboards with advanced visual analytics. Then share your work with anyone and make an impact on your business. From global enterprises to early-stage startups and small businesses, people everywhere use Tableau to see and understand their data. Learn More!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Sisense delivers rapid, full-scale analytics on large and scattered datasets and allows for easy exploration of complex data.
related_products.features:
Sisense is the only business intelligence software that makes it easy for users to prepare, analyze and visualize complex data. Sisense provides an end-to-end solution for tackling growing data sets from multiple sources, that comes out-of-the-box with the ability to crunch terabytes of data and support thousands of users--all on a single commodity server.

Sisense has already won over the hearts of some of the worlds leading, most data-intensive companies, including eBay, Henry Schein, NASA

related_products.short_desc: ProWorkflow is an industry leading and much loved project, task and workflow management software.
related_products.features: ProWorkflow is an industry-leading comprehensive project management tool for teams of 5 to 5000. 17 years of experience and trusted for over 3 million projects, we understand small details through to big data. Track Gantt chart tasks, Kanban boards, time, documents, communications, quotes and invoices. Our powerful API and customizable features let you easily tailor ProWorkflow. World-class customer support & free on-boarding makes the decision to join easy.

related_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features:
Grow is a no-code, full-stack business intelligence (BI) platform that empowers everyone in your organization to make data-driven decisions. 

By combining ETL, data warehousing and visualization in one easy-to-use platform, any organization can connect and explore its data to surface insights. 

Our unlimited-user license model provides a single source of truth for your company, giving everyone access to the answers they need.

related_products.short_desc: An online reporting and business intelligence service that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data.
related_products.features: An online business intelligence and analytics platform that helps you get new insights from your diverse business data. It allows you to easily create and share powerful, ad hoc reports and dashboards in minutes, with no IT help. Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

related_products.short_desc: With Domo, you can empower your entire team with data insights in real-time, cloud-based dashboards.
related_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

With full visibility, you'll be able to reduce long email threads and meetings while your team gets even more done. The all-in-one platform your team will actually enjoy using, monday.com's dashboards allow you to have both the "best in class" and the "enterprise suite."

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Datorama provides the leading cloud-based, AI-powered marketing intelligence and analytics platform for enterprises, agencies, and publishers. Datorama provides marketing intelligence solutions for all marketers and helps you bring together all of your marketing data into one dashboard view. Create compelling data-driven stories with Datorama dashboards, optimize your marketing campaigns, and make data-driven decisions faster.

Data can be imported from files, web feeds, popular business applications, cloud and on-premises databases, cloud storages etc. Free for 2 users. Pricing starts at $25 per month.

similar_products.features: Domo is no ordinary dashboard software. Built on the Domo platform, Domo's dashboards provide data in real-time, so your data is never stale. Create and share custom views of your data on the fly, in minutes, with dashboards that are orders of magnitude easier to use.

similar_products.short_desc: Yellowfin is the only analytics suite that successfully combines action based dashboards with industry-leading automated analysis.

similar_products.short_desc: Analytics platform to connect to all your data sources and build and distribute highly customizable dashboards and reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Grow makes it simple for companies to connect their data and surface insights so everyone can make data-driven decisions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Intelligence software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Intelligence tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Intelligence software enables companies to access, analyze and share information in order to improve decision-making through gathering performance metrics. By providing an infrastructure for compiling, analyzing and distributing key data, Business Intelligence applications facilitate more accurate reporting and monitoring as well as strategy implementation and assessment. Business Intelligence software is related to Reporting software, Knowledge Management software and Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
